example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-19 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-TPC (-NONE- *T*-19)) (NP-SBJ (NN 健康) (NN 状况)) (VP (ADVP (AD 略)) (VP (VA 平稳)))) (DEC 的))) (QP (CD 四) (CLP (M 个))) (NP (NN 孩子))) (VP (ADVP (AD 基本)) (ADVP (AD 已)) (VP (VV 度过) (AS 了) (NP-OBJ (NN 呼吸) (NN 难关)))))
